---
title: "features.yaml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines feature flags and segments for a sandbox environment. It specifies flag configurations, including variants, rules, and rollouts, along with segment definitions and their matching criteria.

## Code Structure
This file does not contain code. It is a YAML file defining data for feature flags and segments.

## Symbols
### `namespace`
#### Description
Defines the namespace for the flags and segments.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `flags`
#### Description
A list of feature flag definitions.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `- key` (under `flags`)
#### Description
The unique identifier for the feature flag.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `name` (under `flags`)
#### Description
The display name of the feature flag.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `description` (under `flags`)
#### Description
A description of the feature flag's purpose.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `enabled` (under `flags`)
#### Description
Indicates whether the feature flag is enabled globally.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `variants` (under `flags`)
#### Description
A list of variants for the feature flag, each with its own configuration.

N/A

### `rules` (under `flags`)
#### Description
Rules for targeting the feature flag to specific segments.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `- segment` (under `rules`)
#### Description
The key of the segment to target.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `rank` (under `rules`)
#### Description
The priority of the rule. Rules with lower rank values have higher priority.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `distributions` (under `rules`)
#### Description
The distribution of variants for the targeted segment.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `- variant` (under `distributions`)
#### Description
The key of the variant to use.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `rollout` (under `distributions`)
#### Description
The percentage of users in the segment to receive the variant (0-100).

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A

### `type` (under `flags`)
#### Description
The data type of the flag value.

#### Inputs
N/A

#### Outputs
N/A

#### Internal Logic
N/A
